MessageReceivedInChannel.Name: Message received in channel
MessageReceivedInChannel.Description: Triggers when a message is received in a specific guild channel.

GuildId.Name: Guild id
GuildId.Description: The ID of the guild to monitor.

ChannelId.Name: Channel id
ChannelId.Description: The ID of the channel to monitor.

MessageId.Name: Message id
MessageId.Description: The ID of the received message.

Content.Name: Message content
Content.Description: The content of the received message.

SenderId.Name: Sender id
SenderId.Description: The ID of the sender of the message.

SenderUsername.Name: Sender username
SenderUsername.Description: The username of the sender of the message.

ReceptionTime.Name: Reception time
ReceptionTime.Description: The time when the message was received.

SendMessageToChannel.Name: Send message to channel
SendMessageToChannel.Description: Sends a message to a specific guild channel as triggo bot.

ChannelId.Name: Channel id
ChannelId.Description: The ID of the channel to send the message to.

Content.Name: Message content
Content.Description: The content of the message to send.

MessageId.Name: Message id
MessageId.Description: The ID of the sent message.

DatabaseCreated.Name: Database created
DatabaseCreated.Description: Trigger when a new database is created in any page.

Id.Name: Database id
Id.Description: The ID of the created database.

Title.Name: Database title
Title.Description: The title of the created database.

Description.Name: Database description
Description.Description: The description of the created database.

Icon.Name: Database icon
Icon.Description: The icon of the created database (can be url or emoji).

ParentId.Name: Parent id
ParentId.Description: The ID of the parent page of the created database (page id).

PageCreated.Name: Page created
PageCreated.Description: Trigger when a new page is created in any database.

Id.Name: Page id
Id.Description: The ID of the created page.

Title.Name: Page title
Title.Description: The title of the created page.

Description.Name: Page description
Description.Description: The description of the created page.

Icon.Name: Page icon
Icon.Description: The icon of the created page (can be url or emoji).

ParentId.Name: Parent id
ParentId.Description: The ID of the parent database of the created page (database or  id).

DatabaseRowCreated.Name: Database row created
DatabaseRowCreated.Description: Trigger when a new row is created in specific database.

DatabaseId.Name: Database id
DatabaseId.Description: The ID of the database to monitor.

Id.Name: Row id
Id.Description: The ID of the created row.

Title.Name: Row title
Title.Description: The title of the created row.

Type.Name: Row type
Type.Description: The type of the created row (page or database).

Description.Name: Row description
Description.Description: The description of the created row.

Icon.Name: Row icon
Icon.Description: The icon of the created row (can be url or emoji).

ParentId.Name: Parent id
ParentId.Description: The ID of the parent database of the created row (database id).

DatabaseRowDeleted.Name: Database row deleted
DatabaseRowDeleted.Description: Trigger when a row is deleted in specific database.

DatabaseId.Name: Database id
DatabaseId.Description: The ID of the database to monitor.

Id.Name: Row id
Id.Description: The ID of the deleted row.

Title.Name: Row title
Title.Description: The title of the deleted row.

Type.Name: Row type
Type.Description: The type of the deleted row (page or database).

Description.Name: Row description
Description.Description: The description of the deleted row.

Icon.Name: Row icon
Icon.Description: The icon of the deleted row (can be url or emoji).

ParentId.Name: Parent id
ParentId.Description: The ID of the parent database of the deleted row (database id).

CreateDatabase.Name: Create database
CreateDatabase.Description: Creates a new database in a specific page.

ParentId.Name: Parent id
ParentId.Description: The ID of the parent page to create the database in.

Title.Name: Database title
Title.Description: The title of the database to create.

Description.Name: Database description
Description.Description: The description of the database to create.

Icon.Name: Database icon
Icon.Description: The icon of the database to create (can be url or emoji).

Id.Name: Database id
Id.Description: The ID of the created database.

ParentId.Name: Parent id
ParentId.Description: The ID of the parent page where you want to create the page.

Title.Name: Page title
Title.Description: The title of the page to create.

Description.Name: Page description
Description.Description: The description of the page to create.

Icon.Name: Page icon
Icon.Description: The icon of the page to create (can be url or emoji).

Id.Name: Page id
Id.Description: The ID of the created page.

CreateDatabaseRow.Name: Create database row
CreateDatabaseRow.Description: Creates a new row in a specific database.

DatabaseId.Name: Database id
DatabaseId.Description: The ID of the database to create the row in.

Title.Name: Row title
Title.Description: The title of the row to create.

Type.Name: Row type
Type.Description: The type of the row to create (page or database).

Description.Name: Row description
Description.Description: The description of the row to create.

Icon.Name: Row icon
Icon.Description: The icon of the row to create (can be url or emoji).

Id.Name: Row id
Id.Description: The ID of the created row.

DatabaseId.Name: Database id
DatabaseId.Description: The ID of the database to archive.

PageId.Name: Page id
PageId.Description: The ID of the page to archive.

CreateCompletion.Name: Create completion
CreateCompletion.Description: Creates a completion using the OpenAI models.

Model.Name: Model
Model.Description: The model to use for the completion.

Prompt.Name: Prompt
Prompt.Description: The prompt to generate the completion from.

MaxTokens.Name: Max tokens
MaxTokens.Description: The maximum number of tokens to generate.

MatchFinished.Name: Match finished
MatchFinished.Description: Trigger when a match is finished.

MatchId.Name: Match id
MatchId.Description: The ID of the finished match.

MatchType.Name: Match type
MatchType.Description: The type of the finished match.

MatchDuration.Name: Match duration
MatchDuration.Description: The duration of the finished match.

MatchWon.Name: Match won
MatchWon.Description: Boolean value indicating if the match was won.

SummonerKda.Name: Summoner KDA
SummonerKda.Description: The KDA of the summoner in the match.

SummonerChampion.Name: Summoner champion
SummonerChampion.Description: The champion played by the summoner in the match.

MatchFinishedWithKdaLowerThan.Description: Trigger when a match is finished with a KDA lower than a specified value.

KdaThreshold.Name: KDA threshold
KdaThreshold.Description: The KDA threshold to trigger the action.
